mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_product pr inner join tb_category ca on (pr.categoryId=ca.id) inner join tb_column co on (ca.columnId = co.id) where (co.id = #{id} or co.parentId = #{id}) and pr.status is true and pr.publish is true

select * from tb_product pr join tb_category ca on (pr.categoryId=ca.id) join tb_column co on (ca.columnId = co.id) where co.id = #{id} or co.parentId = #{id} order by pr.priority desc,pr.hot desc,pr.id desc
select count(pr.id) from tb_product pr inner join tb_category ca on (pr.categoryId=ca.id) where (pr.categoryId = #{cateId} or ca.parentId = #{cateId}) and pr.status is true and pr.publish is true
select * from tb_product pr where pr.categoryId = #{cateId} and pr.status is true and pr.publish is true order by pr.priority desc,pr.hot desc,pr.id desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}
mapper.update: update tb_product set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from tb_product where publish is true and status is true and hot is true order by priority desc,hot desc,id desc limit #{pageSize}
select * from tb_product where enName like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') order by priority desc,hot desc,id desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}
select * from tb_product where enName like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') and publish is true and status is true order by priority desc,hot desc,id desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from tb_product where enName like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') and publish is true and status is true

select * from tb_product pr inner join tb_category ca on (pr.categoryId=ca.id) inner join tb_column co on(ca.columnId=co.id) where pr.publish is true and pr.status is true and (ca.columnId=#{colId} or co.parentId=#{colId}) order by priority desc,hot desc,id desc
select * from tb_product where enName like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') order by priority desc,hot desc,id desc
